juzs.text: Ta shuo:“Zhuwei shizhe a! Nimen you she me chaishi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women que yi feng pai qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong
women jiang yin huimie tamen er jiangxia niantu bian cheng de shitou
na shi cong ni de zhu nali wei guofen zhe er fachu de.”
Wo ba cheng li suoyou de xinshi dou jiule chulai
wo zai cheng li zhi faxian yijia guishun zhe
Wo ceng zai cheng li liu xia yi zhong jixiang, yibian weiju tongku de xingfa de renmen zuo jianjie
Zai mu sa de gushi li yeyou yi zhong jixiang. Dangshi wo ceng paiqian ta daizhe yi jian mingzheng qu jian falao
Dan falao yin you shili er beiqi mu sa, ta shuo:“Zhe shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.”
Suoyi wo chengzhi ta he ta de jundui, er jiang tamen touru haizhong, ta shi shou zebei de
Zai a de ren de gushi li, yeyou yi zhong jixiang. Dangshi, wo ceng shi wuyi de baofeng qu huimie tamen
fan jing na baofeng chuiguo de dongxi, wu yi bu bian cheng posui de
Zai sai mo de ren de gushi li, yeyou yi zhong jixiang. Dangshi, youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhanshi xiangshou ba!”
Tamen ceng weikang tamen de zhu de mingling, gu ji lei huimiele tamen, tongshi, tamen yanjian xingfa jianglin
tamen wei neng zhan qi, tamen ye wei neng ziwei
Yiqian, wo huimiele nu ha de zongzu, tamen que shi beini de minzhong
Tian, wo ceng yi wo de da neng jianzao ta, wo que shi da neng de
de, wo ceng puzhang ta. Meizai puzhang zhe
Wo jiang mei zhong wu zaocheng pei'ou, yibian nimen juewu
Ni shuo:“Nimen yingdang tao gui an la, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe
Nimen buyao yi bie de shenling yu an la tong shou chongbai, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen yiqian de ge minzu ye xiang zheyang, mei you yige shizhe lailin tamen, tamen jiu shuo:“Ta shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.”
Nandao tamen ceng yi ci hua huxiang zhufu ma? Buran, tamen dou shi beini de minzhong
Ni yingdang tuibi tamen, ni jue bushi shou zebei de
Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jiaohui duiyu xinshi que shi youyi de
Wo chuangzao jingling he renlei, zhi wei yao tamen chongbai wo
Wo bu wang tamen de gongji, wo ye bu wang tamen de fengyang
An la que shi gongji wanwu de, que shi you quanli de, que shi jianding de
Bu yi de renmen. He tamen de pengyou yiyang, bidei yi fen xingfa, suoyi jiao tamen buyao cuicu wo
Shang zai bu xindao de renmen! Dang tamen bei jinggao de rizi lailin de shihou
Yi shanyue mengshi
yi tian jing zhi shu
xie yu zhankai de pizhi zhe mengshi
yi zhong tianshi chaojin de tian fang mengshi
yi bei sheng qi de cangqiong mengshi
yi wangyang de dahai mengshi
ni de zhu de xingfa, que shi yao shixian de
shi renhe ren buneng dikang de
Zai tianti zhendong
shanyue shiqu zhi ri
zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen
ji yi wangyan xiaoqian de renmen
Tamen jiang bei touru huo yu
Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian suo fouren de huoxing
Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian ne
Nimen jin huo yu qu ba! Nimen renshou qizhong de xingfa yu fou, sui nimen de fangbian, na duiyu nimen shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou ziji xingwei de baochou
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan he enze zhong
tamen yin zhu de shangci er kuaile, tamen de zhu shi tamen de mian yu liehuo de xingfa
Nimen yin ziji de xingwei er yukuai de chihe ba
Tamen kao zai fen lie chengxing de chuangshang, wo jiang yi baixi de, mei mudi nuzi zuo tamen de banlu
Ziji xindao, zisun ye genzhe xindao zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun yu tamen tong ji, wo bu jianshao tamen de shangong yi sihao. Mei ren yingdui ziji de xingwei fuze
Wo jiang yi tamen suo shihao de shuiguo he roushi gongji tamen
tamen zai leyuan zhong hu di (yin) bei, tamen bu yin'er chu e yan, ye bu yin zhi er fanzui e
Tamen de tongpu lunliuzhe fushi tamen, naxie tongpu, haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang
Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun
tamen jiang shuo:“Yiqian women wei ziji de jiashu que shi zhanzhanjingjing de
dan an la yi shi en yu women, bing shi women de mian yu du feng de xingfa
Yiqian women que shi changchang qidao ta, ta que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.”
Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jie ni de zhu de endian, ni bushi yige zhanbu zhe, ye bushi yige feng ren
Buran, tamen shuo:“Ta shi yige shiren, women dengdai ta zaofeng eyun.”
Ni shuo:” Nimen dengdai ba! Wo que shi yu nimen yitong dengdai de.”
Nandao tamen de lizhi mingling tamen shuo zhe ju hua ma? Buran, tamen shi fangdang de minzhong
Nandao tamen shuo ta ceng niezao ta ma? Buran, qishi shi tamen bu gui xin
Jiao tamen zuochu xiang zheyang de wenci lai, ruguo tamen shi shuo shihua de
Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao chulai ne? Haishi tamen ziji jiushi chuangzao zhe ne
Nandao tamen cengjing chuangzao tiandi ma, buran, shi tamen bu quexin an la
Shi ni de zhu de kucang gui tamen zhangguan ne? Haishi tamen shi naxie kucang de jiandu ne
Nandao tamen youyi jia tianti, keyi deng shangqu qingting ma? Jiao tamen zhong de qingting zhe na yige mingzheng lai ba
Nandao an la you nu'er, nimen you erzi ma
Nandao ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, gu tamen wei nashui er danfu tai zhong
Nandao tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu neng jiang ta ji zhu xialai
Nandao tamen yu yong jimou ma? Buxindao zhe, jiang zi zhong qi ji
Nandao chu an la wai, tamen hai you bie de shenling ma? An la shi chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.”
Ruguo tamen kanjian tian diao xialai yikuai, tamen jiang shuo:“Zhe shi cheng dui de yuncai
Ni ren sui tamen ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu ziji bei zhen si de rizi
Zai na ri, tamen de jimou, duiyu tamen hao wu biyi, tamen ye bu shou yuanzhu
Bu yi de renmen, zai na ri zhiqian, biding yao shou yi zhong xingfa, dan tamen daban bu zhidao
Ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de qinyan juangu zhi xia de. Ni qilai de shihou, yingdang zansong ni de zhu
zai yejian he zai xingsu moluohou, ni yingdang zansong ta
Yi mo luo shi de xingsu mengshi
nimen de pengyou, ji bu mi wu, you wei mixin
ye wei sui siyu er yan
Zhe zhishi tasuo shou de qishi
jiaoshou ta de, shi na qiangjian de
youli de, gu ta dadao quanmei
Ta zai dongfang de zuigao chu
ranhou ta jianjian jiejin er jiangdi
ta xiangju liang zhanggong de changdu, huo geng jin yixie
Ta ba tasuo ying shou qishi, qishi gei ta de puren
ta de xin meiyou fouren ta suo jian de
Nandao nimen yao wei ta suo jian de er yu ta zhenglun ma
Ta que yi jian ta er ci xiajiang
zai ji jing de suanzao shu pang
na li you guisu de leyuan
Dang suanzao shu meng shang yi ceng dongxi de shihou
yan wei xie shi, ye wei guofen
ta que yi kanjian ta de zhu de yibufen zuida de jixiang
Nimen gaosu wo ba! La te he ou sa
yiji paihang di san, yeshi zui ci de mo na, zenme shi an la de nu'er ne
Nandao nanhai gui nimen, nuhai que gui an la ma
Ran'er, zhe shi bu gongping de fenpei
Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suoding de mingcheng, an la bing wei jiayi zhengshi, tamen zhishi ping caixiang he siyu. Zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen
Nandao ren xiwang shenme jiu you she me
Houshi he jinshi, dou shi an la de
Tianshang de xuduo tianshi, tamen de shuo qing, hao wu biyi, chufei zai an la xuke tamen wei ta suo yiyu he suo xiyue zhe shuo qing zhihou
bu xin houshi de renmen, dique yi nuxing de mingcheng chenghu tianshimen
Tamen duiyu na zhong chenghu, jue wu renhe zhishi, tamen zhi ping caixiang; er caixiang duiyu zhenli, que shi hao wu biyi de
Ni yingdang bi kai na weibei wo de jiaohui, qie zhi yu xiang jinshi shenghuo zhe
na shi tamen de zhishi chengdu. Ni de zhu, que shi quanzhi beili zhengdao zhe de, yeshi quanzhi zunxun zhengdao zhe de
Tiandi wanwu dou shi an la de. Ta chuangzao wanwu, yibian ta yi zuo'e zhe de xingwei er baochou tamen, bing yizhi shan de pinji baochou xingshan zhe

Yuanli dazui he choushi, dan fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi kuanyou de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen de shihou, dang nimen shi zai mu fu zhong de tai'er de shihou, ta shi quanzhi nimen de; suoyi nimen buyao zicheng qingbai, ta shi quanzhi jingwei zhe de
Ni gaosu wo ba! Weibei zhengdao
shaoshao shishe jiu qianlin de ren
nandao ta zhidao youxuan, gu ren ziji de xingwei wei zhenli ma
Nandao meiyou ren gaosuguo ta mu sa de jingdian
he luxing jie ming de yi bo la xin de jingdian zhong suo jizai de shiqing ma
Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu bieren de zui
Ge ren zhide xiangshou ziji de laoji
ta de laoji, jiang bei kanjian
ranhou ta jiang shou zui wanquan de baochou
Ni de zhu, shi zhongsheng de guisu
Ta neng shi ren xiao, neng shi ren ku
ta neng shi ren si, neng shi rensheng
ta ceng chuangzao pei'ou ──nanxing de yu nuxing de ──
shi yi shechu de jingye
ta yi zaizao wei jiren
ta neng shi ren fuzu, neng shi ren manyi
ta shi tianlangxing de zhu
Ta huimiele gu shi de a de ren
he sai mo de ren, er weicengyou suo yiliu
yiqian, ta huimiele nu ha de zongzu. Tamen que shi geng bu yi de, que shi geng fangdang de
Ta shi na bei dianfu de chengshi fuwang
gu fugai de dongxi ceng fugaile na chengshi
Ni huaiyi ni de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zhe shi gu shi di naxie jinggao zhe zhi zhong de yige jinggao zhe
Linjin de shijian, yijing linjinle
chu an la wai, meiyou neng jieshi ta de
Nandao nimen wei zhe xun ci er chayi ma
Nimen zenme chaoxiao er bu tongku ne
Nimen shi shuhu de
Nimen yingdang wei an la er koutou, yingdang chongbai ta
Fuhuo shi linjinle, yueliang poliele
Ruguo tamen kanjian yi zhong jixiang, tamen jiu tuibi, erqie shuo: Zhe shi yi zhong youli de moshu
Tamen fouren ta, erqie shuncong siyu. Mei yi jian shi dou shi queding de
Baohan jingjie de xuduo xiaoxi, que yi lailin tamenle
na shi ji jingmi de zhihui; dan jinggao shi wuxiao de
gu ni yingdang bi kai tamen. Dang zhaohuan zhe zhao ren yu nanshi de rizi
tamen bu gan yangshi de you fenmu chulai, haoxiang shi biandi de huangchong
dajia yinjing er ben, qunji yu zhaohuan zhe de mianqian. Bu xindao de renmen jiang shuo: Zhe shi yige fannan de rizi
Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de zongzu fourenguo, tamen fourenguo wo de puren, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi yige feng ren.” Ta ceng bei he chi
gu ta qidao ta de zhu shuo:“Wo que shi bei yapo de, qiu ni xiangzhu ba!”
Wo jiu yi qingzhu de yushui kaile xuduo tianmen
wo you shi da dishang de quanyuan yong chu; yushui he quanshui, jiu yi jiding de qingzhuang er huihe
Wo shi ta chengzuo zai yi zhi yong muban he dingzi zhizao de chuanshang
zai wo de qinyan juangu zhi xia piaoliu, yi baoda bei ren fouren zhe
Wo que yi jiang zhe jian shi liu zuo yi zhong jixiang, you jieshou quangao zhe ma
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu ji du, you jieshou quangao de ren ma
A de ren fourenguo xianzhi, wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de
Wo que yi shi fengbao zai yige hen xiong'e de rizi qu huimie tamen
baofeng jiang zhongren ba qi, tamen haoxiang bei ba chu di hai zao shu yiyang
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de
Wo que yi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma
Sai mo de ren fourenguo jinggao
gu tamen shuo: Women tongzu de yige fanren, women neng shuncong ta ma? Ruguo nayang, women biding xianyu mi wu he fengkuang zhi zhong
Nandao ta zai women zhi jian duzi feng dao qishi ma? Buran, ta shi shuohuang zhe, shi aoman zhe.”
Tamen mingri jiang zhidao shei shi shuohuang zhe, shei shi aoman zhe
Wo biding shi mu tuo kaoyan tamen, gu ni yingdang qidai tamen, bing yingdang jianren
ni yingdang gaosu tamen, jing shui shi tamen he mu tuo suo jun fen de, ying de shuifen de, lunliuzhe dao jing bian lai
Tamen ceng han lai tamen de pengyou, ta jiu na qi jian lai zaile mu tuo
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de
Wo que yi shi yi zhong baozha qu huimie tamen, tamen jiu bian cheng zao quan lan zhe suoyong de kumu
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu ji du, you jieshou quangao de ren ma
Lu te de zongzu ceng fouren jinggao
wo que yi shi feishazoushi de fengbao qu huimie tamen; wei lu te de xintu, wo zai liming shi zhengjiule tamen
Na shi cong wo nali fachu de endian, wo ruci baochou ganxie zhe
Ta que yi jiang wo de chengzhi jinggao tamen, dan tamen yi huaiyi de taidu fouren jinggao
Tamen que yi youhuo ta, jiao ta buyao baohu ta de keren, dan wo tumole tamen de yanjing. Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba
Yi zhong yongheng de xingfa zai zaochen que yi xijile tamen
Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu ji du, you jieshou quangao de ren ma
Jinggao yi jianglin falao de baixing
tamen fourenle wo de yi qie jixiang, guwo yi wanneng zhe, quanneng zhe de taidu, chengzhile tamen
Nimen zhong bu xindao de renmen bi zhe deng ren hai youxiu ne! Haishi tian jing zhong you guanyu nimen de she tiao ne
Nandao tamen shuo:“Women shi yige chang sheng de tuanti.”
Nage tuanti jiang baibei, tamen jiang zhuan bei
Buran, fuhuo shi shi tamen de yue qi; fuhuo shi shi geng jiannan de, shi geng xinku de
Fanzui zhe dique zai mi wu he liehuo zhong
Tamen pufuzhe bei tuo ru huo yu zhi ri, jiang dui tamen shuo:“Nimen changshi huo yu de shaozhuo ba!”
Wo que yi yi dingliang er chuangzao wanwu
wo de mingling zhishi kuai ru zhuanshun de yiju hua
Wo que yi jiang nimen de zongpai huimiele. You jieshou quangao de ren ma
Fan tamen suo zuo de shi, dou jizai zai tian jing zhong
Yiqie xiaoshi he dashi, dou shi bei jilu de
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan li, zai ge zhong he'an bian
zai quanneng de zhu nali, de ju yige ruyi di diwei
Zhiren zhu
ceng jiaoshou “gulanjing”
ta chuangzaole ren
bing jiao ren xiuci
Ri yue shi yi dingshu er yunxing de
Caomu shi shuncong ta de yizhi de
Ta ceng jiang tian sheng qi. Ta ceng guiding gongping
yimian nimen yong cheng bugong
Nimen yingdang binggong di jin shou heng du, nimen buyao shi suo cheng zhi wu fenliang buzu
Ta wei zhongsheng er jiang dadi fangxia
Dadishang you shuiguo, he you hua bi di hai zao
yu you gan de wugu he xiangcao
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Ta ceng yong taoqi ban de gan tu chuangzao ren
ta yong huoyan chuangzao jingling
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Ta shi liang ge dongfang de zhu, yeshi liang ge xifang de zhu
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Ta ceng ren liang hai xiangjiao er huihe
liang hai zhi jian, you yige di fang, liang hai hu bu qinfan
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Ta cong liang haizhong quchu zhenzhu he shanhu
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai haizhong wei fan gaoju, zhuang ru shanluan de chuanbo, zhishi ta de
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Fan zai da dishang de, dou yao huimie
weiyou ni de yong huo de, juyou zunyan yu da de de zhu de zun rong, jiang yongheng cunzai
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Fan zai tiandi jian de dou yang qiu ta; ta shishi dou you shiwu
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Jingling he renlei a! Wo jiang zhuanxin yingfu nimen
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Jingling he renlei de qunzhong a! Ruguo nimen neng tongguo tiandi de jingjie, nimen jiu tongguo ba! Nimen bixu pingju yi zhong quanbing, caineng tongguo
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Huoyan he huo yan jiang bei jiang yu nimen, er nimen buneng ziwei
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Dangtian po li de shihou, tian jiang bian cheng meigui se, haoxiang hong pi yiyang
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai na ri, renhe ren he jingling dou bu yin zuiguo er shoushen wen
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Fanzui zhe jiang yin tamen de xingji er bei renshi, tamen de e fa jiang bei xi zai jiao zhangshang
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zhe shi fanzui zhe suo fouren de huo yu
Tamen jiang wanglai yu huo yu he feishui zhi jian
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Fan pa zhan zai zhu de yuqian shoushen wen zhe, dou de xiangshou liang zuo leyuan
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Na liang zuo leyuan, shi you ge zhong guoshu de
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you liang dong liuxing de quanyuan
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, mei zhong shuiguo, dou you liangyang
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Tamen kao zai yong jinduan zuo lizi de zuo ru shang, na liang zuo leyuan de shuiguo, dou shi shou suo neng ji de
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai naxie leyuan zhong, you bu shi feili de qizi, zai tamen de qi zi zhiqian, renhe ren he renhe jingling dou wei yu tamen jiaojieguo
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Tamen hao xiang hongbaoshi he shanhu yiyang
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Xingshan zhe, zhi shou shan bao
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Ci yu na liang zuo leyuan de, hai you liang zuo leyuan
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Na liang zuo leyuan dou shi cangcui de
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you liang dong yong chu de quanyuan
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you shuiguo, you hai zao, you shiliu
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai naxie leyuan li, you xuduo xianshu jiali de nuzi
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Tamen shi baixi de, shi zheju yu zhangmu zhong de
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Zai tamen de qi zi zhiqian, renhe ren huo jingling, dou weiceng yu tamen jiaojieguo
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Tamen kao zai cuilu de zuo ru he meili de hua tan shang
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Duo fu zai, ni ju zunyan he da de de zhu de ming hao
Dang na jian dashi fasheng de shihou
meiyou renhe ren fouren qi fasheng
Na jian dashi jiang shi neng shi ren jiangji, neng shi ren shengji de
dang da di zhendang
shanluan fensui
hua wei sanman de chen'ai
er nimen fen wei san deng de shihou
Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren
Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren
Zui xianxing shan zhe, shi zui xianru leyuan de ren
zhe deng ren, que shi meng zhu juangu de
Tamen zai enze de leyuan zhong
Xuduo qian ren
he shaoshu hou ren
zai zhubao xiang cheng de chuangta shang
Bici xiangdui di kao zai shangmian
Changsheng bulao de tong pu, lunliu zhefu dai tamen
pengzhe zhan he hu, yu man bei de liquan
tamen bu yin na liquan er toutong, ye bu mingding
Tamen you ziji suo xuanze de shuiguo
he ziji suo aihao de niao rou
Hai you baixi de, mei mudi qizi
haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang
Na shi weile baochou tamen de shanxing
Tamen zai leyuan li, ting bu dao e yan he huanghua
dan ting dao shuo: Zhu nimen ping'an! Zhu nimen ping'an
Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren
Tamen xiangshou wu ci de suanzao shu
jieshi leilei de (xiangjiao) shu
manman de shu yin
fanfan de liushui
fengfu de shuiguo
si shi bu jue, keyi suiyi zhai shi
yu bei sheng qi de chuangta
Wo shi tamen chongxin shengzhang
wo shi tamen chang wei chunu
yilian zhangfu, bici tong sui
zhexie dou shi xingfu zhe suo xiangshou de
Xuduo qian ren
he xuduo hou ren
Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren
Tamen zai du feng he feishui zhong
zai hei yan de yinying xia
ji bu liangshuang, you bu meiguan
Yiqian tamen que shi shechi de
que shi guzhi dazui de
tamen chang shuo:“Nandao women si hou, yi bian cheng chentu he kugu de shihou, women biding yao fuhuo ma? ”
Lian women de zuxian, ye yao fuhuo ma?”
Ni shuo: Qian ren he hou ren
zai yige zhuming de riqi he teding shijian biding yao bei jihe
Ranhou mi wu de, fouren fuhuo de renmen a
Nimen biding shi zan hu mu de guoshi
er yi ta chongji
ranhou tong yin feishui
xiang hai xiao ke bing de luotuo yin liangshui yiyang
Zhe shi tamen zai baoying zhi ri suo shou de kuandai
Wo ceng chuangzao nimen, nimen zen buxin fuhuo ne
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo she de jingye
jiujing shi nimen ba ta zaocheng ren ne? Haishi wo ba ta zaocheng ren ne
Wo ceng jiang siwang fenpei ji nimen, renhe ren buneng zunao wo
bu rang wo gaibian nimen de pin xing, er shi nimen shengzhang zai nimen suo buzhi de zhuangtai zhong
Nimen que yi zhidao chuci de shengzhang, nimen zen bu juewu ne
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo gengzhong de zhuangjia
jiujing shi nimen shi ta fa rong ne? Haishi wo shi ta fa rong ne
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi ta diaoling, er nimen bian cheng chayi zhe
nimen jiang shuo:“Women shi zao sunshi de.”
Buran, women shi bei boduo de.”
Nimen gaosu ba! Nimen suo yin de shui
jiujing shi nimen shi ta cong yun shang jiangxia de ne? Haishi wo shi ta jiangxia de ne
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi ta bian cheng ku de, nimen zenme bu ganxie ne
Nimen gaosu ba! Nimen suo zuan qu de huo
jiujing shi nimen shi sui mu shengzhang de ne? Haishi wo shi ta shengzhang de ne
Wo yi ta wei jiaoxun, bingqie yi ta wei huangye de jumin de weiji
gu ni yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming
Wo bi yi xingsu de moluo chu mengshi
zhe que shi yige zhongda de mengshi, jiaruo nimen zhidao
Zhe que shi baogui de “gulanjing”
jilu zai zhencang de jing ben zhong
zhiyou chunjie zhe cai de fumo na jing ben
“Gulanjing” shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de
Nandao nimen miaoshi zhe xun ci
er yi fouren daiti ganxie ma
(Nimen) zenme buzai linghun dao jiang sizhe de yanhou de shihou
na shihou, nimen dajia kanzhe ta
wo bi nimen geng linjin ta, dan nimen bu xiaode
ruguo nimen bushi shou baoying de
nimen zen bu shi linghun fu fan yu benwei ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de
Ruguo ta shi bei juangu de
name, ta jiang xiangshou shushi, jiyang yu enze de leyuan
ruguo ta shi xingfu zhe
name, yiban xingfu de ren jiang dui ta shuo: Zhu ni ping'an
Ruguo ta shi mi wu de, fouren fuhuo zhe
name, ta jiang xiangshou feishui de kuandai
he liehuo de shaozhuo
Zhe que shi wu ke zhiyi de zhenli
Gu ni yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming
Tiandi wanwu, dou zansong an la chaojue wanwu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de
Tiandi de guo quan, gui tasuoyou; ta neng shi rensheng, neng shi ren si; ta duiyu wanshi, shi quanneng de
Ta shi qian wu shi hou wu zhong de, shi ji xianzhu ji yin wei de, ta shi quanzhi wanwu de

Ta shi zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi, ranhou sheng shang baozuo de. Ta zhidao qianru di zhong de, he cong di zhong shengchu de, yu cong tiankong jiangxia de, he sheng shang tiankong de. Wulun nimen zai nali, ta shi yu nimen tong zai de; ta shi jian cha nimen de xingwei de
Tiandi de guo quan, gui ta suoyou; wanshi zhi guiyu an la
Ta shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye; ta shi quanzhi xinshi de
Nimen yingdang xinyang an la he shizhe, nimen yingdang fen she ta suo wei nimen dai guan de caichan, nimen zhong xindao erqie shishe zhe, jiang shou zhongda de baochou
Nimen zenme bu xinyang an la ni? Shizhe haozhao nimen qu xinyang nimen de zhu, er nimen de zhu, que yi he nimen diyue, ruguo nimen shi xinshi di hua
Ta jiang shi ta de puren xuduo mingzheng, yibian ta shi nimen cong chongchong hei'an zou ru guangming. An la duiyu nimen, que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de

Nimen zenme bu wei an la er shishe ne? Tiandi de yichan, zhishi an la de. Nimen zhong zai shengli zhiqian shishe erqie canzhan zhe, yu zai shengli zhihou shishe erqie canzhan zhe, bushi pingdeng de, qianzhe bi hou zhe pinji geng gao. An la yi zui you de baochou yingxu mei pai ren, an la shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de
Shei yi shan zhai jie gei an la ni? An la jiang jiabei changhuan ta, ta hai shou youhou de baochou

Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian nannu xinshimen, tamen de guanghui, zai tamen de qianmian he youbian benchi, youren jiang dui tamen shuo: Nimen jinri de jiayin, shi xia lin zhu he de leyuan; nimen jiang yong ju qizhong, na que shi weida de chenggong

Zai na ri, wei xin de nannu, jiang dui xindao de nannu shuo: Qing nimen denghou women, rang women jie nimen de yidian guanghui! Youren jiangyao dui tamen shuo: Nimen zhuan huiqu xunqiu guanghui ba! Yushi, bici zhi jian, zhu qile yi du gebi lai, gebi shang youyidaomen, men nei you enhui, men wai you xingfa

Tamen jiang hanjiao xindao de renmen shuo: Nandao women yu nimen bushi tong jiao ma? Tamen shuo: Buran, nimen zi qi, guanwang, huaiyi zhengdao, zhongzhong wangxiang qipian nimen, zhidao an la de mingling lailin, hua zei ceng yi an la de yourong qipian nimen
Gu jinri nimen yu bu xindao zhe de fajin, dou bu bei jieshou, nimen de guisu shi huo yu, na duiyu nimen shi geng xiangyi de, na guisu zhen elie

Nandao xinshimen yiwei shijian hai wei dao, gu tamen de xin bu wei an la de jiaohui he tasuo jiang shi de zhenli er rouhe ma? Tamen bu keyi xiang yiqian ceng fengtian jing de renmen nayang, jingguo chang shiqi hou, tamen de xin jiu bian yingle, tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi fanzui de
Nimen yingdang zhidao an la shi shi yi si de dadi fuhuo de, wo que yi wei nimen jieshile xuduo jixiang, yibian nimen mingli
Shi cai de nannu, he yi shan zhai jie gei an la de nannu, ta biding jiabei changhuan tamen, tamen jiang shou youhou de baochou

Xinyang an la he shizhe de renmen, zai zhu nali, shi qiancheng zhe, shi jianzheng zhe, tamen jiang you tamen de baochou he guangming. Bu xindao bingqie fouren wo de jixiang de renmen, shi huo yu de jumin

Nimen yingdang zhidao, jinshi de shenghuo, zhishi youxi, yule, zhuangshi, jinkua, yi caichan he zisun de fushu xiang zhengsheng; piru shi yu, shi tianmiao zizhang, nongfu jianle feichang gaoxing, sihou, tianmiao kugao, ni kan ta bian cheng huangse de, ji'er lingluo. Zai houshi, you yanli de xingfa, yeyou cong an la fachu de she youhe xiyue; jinshi shenghuo, zhishi pian ren de xiangshou

Nimen yingdang zhengqu cong nimen de zhu fachu de she you, he yu tiandi yiyang guangkuo de leyuan--wei xinyang an la he zhong shizhe de renmen er zhunbei de leyuan--na shi an la de endian, ta jiang ta shangci tasuo yiyu zhe. An la shi you hong en de
Dadi suoyou de zainan, he nimen ziji suo zao de huohuan, zai wo chuangzao naxie huohuan zhiqian, wubu jilu zai tian jing zhong; zhe shi duiyu an la que shi rongyi de
yimian nimen wei ziji suo sangshi de er beishang, wei tasuo shangci nimen de er kuangxi. An la shi bu xi'ai yiqie aoman zhe, jinkua zhe de
Tamen ziji linse, hai jiao bieren linse. Guibiyiwu de renmen, an la que shi wu qiu yu tamen de, que shi ke song de

Wo que yi paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, qu chuanda wo de xuduo mingzheng, bing jiang shi tian jing he gongping, yibian zhongren jin shou gongdao. Wo ceng chuangzao gangtie, qizhong you yanli de xingfa, duiyu zhongren meiyou xuduo bi yi; yibian an la zhidao zai mimi zhong xiangzhu ta he ta de zhong shizhe de ren. An la que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de
Wo que yi paiqian nu ha he yi bo la xin, wo yi yuyan he tian jing shangci ta lia de houyi; tamen zhong you zunxun zhengdao de, tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi beini de

Zai tamen zhihou, wo ceng jixu paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, wo you jixu paiqian mai er yan zhizi er sa, wo shangci ta “yin zhi lei”, wo shi ta de xintumen xinhuai ren'ai he ci min. Tamen zi chuang chujia zhi--wo weiceng yi chujia wei tamen de dingzhi--tamen chuangshe ci zhi, yi qiu an la de xiyue; dan tamen weiceng qieshi de zunshou ta, guwo ba baochou shangci tamen zhong de xindao zhe. Tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi beini de

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang xinyang ta de shizhe, ta jiu ba ta de enhui jiabei shangci nimen, ta jiu wei nimen chuangzao yi dao guangming; nimen jiang jie na dao guangming er xingzou, ta jiu she you nimen. An la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de

Yibian ceng shou tian jing de renmen zhidao, tamen jianzhi buneng caozong an la de endian, bingqie zhidao, fan endian dou zai an la de zhangwo zhong, ta yao shangci shei, jiu shangci shei, an la shi you hong en de
